entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain near noon. High plus 2. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of freezing rain or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to periods of freezing rain this evening. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
